name: Faceified
tag_list: classifieds, reputation, marketing, reviews, advertisement, real-estate
overview:
Faceified offers a suite of free tools to enable real estate agents and other service providers who advertise on online, classifieds such as Craigslist, Backpage, etc., to promote their brand, enhance their reputation, and ultimately capture more leads.

Users create and customize a business profile and get a Faceified Seal that displays their brand. They insert the Seal into listings on any classifieds sites that support external image links to personalize their listings and promote their brand. Buyers can click on the Seal to view the user’s other listings, customer reviews, and links to the user’s content on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, YouTube, and more. The Seal also tracks listings and provides traffic stats to allow the users to optimize their business strategies. Finally, users can use our free tools to request, approve, and manage reviews from past and current customers to enhance their reputation.
